caption.p: Omnidirectional variograms computed using the standardized residuals derived from the spatial generalized linear model used in lower-Northern Thailand (A), in the Red River Delta, Vietnam (B), in the Vietnam highlands (C) and in Lake Alaotra, Madagascar highlands (D). The dashed lines show the pointwise 95% limits constructed from the Monte Carlo 999 simulations; circles represent the empirical variogram.
Click here for additional data file.
